rules.title: Verify Patient Status
rules.condition: Patient initiates contact or agent answers call.
rules.action: Ask if the patient is new or established.
rules.example: Welcome! Are you a new patient or have you visited us before?

rules.title: Acknowledge Patient Status
rules.action: Confirm understanding of the patient's status.
rules.example: Okay, so you're an established patient with us.

rules.title: Request Identifying Information
rules.action: Ask for specific identifying details to locate their chart.
rules.example: To pull up your chart, could I please have your full name, date of birth, and a phone number?

rules.title: Acknowledge ID Receipt
rules.action: Confirm receipt of the provided information.

rules.title: Inform Chart Access & Wait
rules.condition: Agent is about to access patient records.
rules.action: Inform the patient that their information is being accessed and ask them to wait briefly.
rules.example: Please hold for just a moment while I access your records.

rules.title: Confirm Call Purpose
rules.action: Confirm the reason for the call and ask for specific appointment needs.
rules.example: Now that I have your chart open, what can I help you with today? Are you looking to schedule an appointment?

rules.title: Check Appointment Availability
rules.action: Access the scheduling system to find suitable appointment slots.
rules.example: Let me check for available appointments for a follow-up. What days and times work best for you?

rules.title: Provide Post-Scheduling Instructions
rules.condition: Appointment has been successfully scheduled and confirmed.
rules.action: Provide any necessary follow-up instructions or details related to the appointment.
rules.example: Great, your appointment is set for Tuesday, October 24th at 10 AM. Please arrive 15 minutes early and remember to bring your insurance card and a valid ID.

rules.title: Final Appointment Recap
rules.condition: After an appointment has been successfully scheduled and any initial instructions have been provided.
rules.action: Reiterate the scheduled appointment's date, time, and type for a final confirmation.
rules.example: To confirm, your follow-up appointment is scheduled for Tuesday, October 24th at 10 AM.

rules.title: Offer Email Confirmation
rules.condition: After an appointment has been successfully scheduled and confirmed.
rules.action: Offer to send an email confirmation of the appointment details.
rules.example: Would you like me to send an email confirmation of your appointment details to the email address on file?

rules.title: Provide Insurance and Payment Options
rules.condition: Before finalizing an appointment or upon patient inquiry.
rules.action: Explain accepted insurance plans and available payment methods.
rules.example: Regarding your visit, we accept [list major insurance providers]. Do you have any questions about our payment options or co-pays?

rules.title: Check for Further Assistance
rules.condition: After all primary tasks for the current interaction are completed.
rules.action: Ask the patient if they require any further assistance before concluding the call.
rules.example: Is there anything else I can assist you with today?
